name: Dragon's Den (Link_)
description:
Action platformer where you venture deep into a dragon's den and defeat the boss.

https://gx.games/games/kfm9g7/dragon-s-den/tracks/70ab651c-055d-4475-aedd-e3aa4a...

You can play the game online on gx games above ^

Play in fullscreen for the best experience.

CONTROLS:

esc: quit game
wad: movement + jump
f: interact with objects
e: shoot fire spell
space: confirm selection / swing weapon
tab: open inventory
